name: slides-studio
description: a bridge between Obsidian and OBS

scripts.dev: cp -r build/slides_studio ../testVault/.obsidian/plugins/slides-studio/ && cp build/manifest.json ../testVault/.obsidian/plugins/slides-studio/manifest.json && node esbuild.config.mjs
scripts.build: cp -r build/slides_studio ../slidesStudio-vault/.obsidian/plugins/slides-studio/ && cp build/manifest.json ../slidesStudio-vault/.obsidian/plugins/slides-studio/manifest.json && node esbuild.config.mjs production
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
